cards.text2: Move Train up to 3 spaces forward
cards.text3: If Brisco’s train is ahead of your train when reaching a station, stop, place a disk in the station, and gain the tile if possible

cards.text2: Move Train up to 3 spaces forward
cards.text3: If Brisco’s train is ahead of your train when reaching a station, stop, place a disk in the station, and gain the tile if possible
If there are multiple to choose from, choose the top, left least expensive worker

cards.text2: Take a cattle card worth the 'highest' amount of victory points
Take a cattle card worth the 'least' amount of victory points

cards.text3: If there are multiple to choose from, choose the top, left least expensive worker

cards.text2: Take the teepee tile with the 'highest' dollar value
Take a hazard tile worth the 'highest' amount of victory points
Draw a random building from the Brisco’s bag of buildings and place it on 'Side A' in the next space in front of you on the trail

cards.text: Move Forward based on current speed
Move Forward based on current speed

cards.text2: Take an Objective Card that is worth the 'highest' amount of victory points
